markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aquatic Conversationalist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2302) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) with the [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207) or [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168) traits. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on such animals.
name: Aquatic Conversationalist
